archimate:Requirement.name: PA.2.2.3c: c) device tracking (e.g. software that will attempt to locate the equipment using GPS, or automatically contact a designated location if the equipment can connect to the internet or a mobile network operator)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
